exercises.title: Bank Account
exercises.description: Create a BankAccount with unexported balance. Add Deposit, Withdraw (returns error if insufficient), and Balance.
exercises.descriptionHtml: Create a BankAccount with unexported balance. Add Deposit, Withdraw (returns error if insufficient), and Balance.

hints.title: ðŸ’¡ Hint
hints.content: Lowercase `balance` makes it private. Use pointer receivers for Deposit/Withdraw. Return `fmt.Errorf(...)` for insufficient funds.

exercises.expected:
acc := BankAccount{}
acc.Deposit(100)
acc.Withdraw(30)
fmt.Println(acc.Balance()) // 70
err := acc.Withdraw(100)   // error: insufficient funds
